resources.string:
COVID-19 Symptoms 

 1- Fever or chills Cough 
 2-Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing Fatigue 
 3- Muscle or body aches 
 4-Headache 
 5- New loss of taste or smell 
 6- Sore throat 
 7- Congestion or runny nose 
 8- Nausea or vomiting Diarrhea

COVID-19 prevention

 1. Wash your hands frequently and 
 carefully 
 2. Avoid touching your face 
 3. Stop shaking hands and hugging people — for now 
 4. Don’t share personal items 
 5. Cover your mouth and nose when you cough and sneeze 
 6. Clean and disinfect surfaces
